  • 方法详细资料

    • setReplacement

      public void setReplacement​(char encryptedChar, char replacementChar)
      参数:
      encryptedChar - This is the word that needs to be replaced
      replacementChar - This is the value corresponding to the word to be replaced.

    • getEncryptedString

      public java.lang.String getEncryptedString()
      返回:
      Return the encrypted text for easy observation.

    • getDecryptedString

      public java.lang.String getDecryptedString()

      Return the answer guessed by the user.

      return correct answer
